movies.title: If It Don't Fit, Use a Bigger Hammer
movies.originalTitle: Was nicht passt, wird passend gemacht
movies.plot: A group of rather slap dash builders are rather imaginative at solving what problems come their way. Whatever it is that doesn't fit the picture, it will be made fit in no time. This approach works equally well with a tightfisted contractor or the remains of an illegal foreign worker on the site. And then they're saddled with an arrogant student of architecture who is doing his work experience with them - and who shows interest in the pretty daughter of one of them.
movies.simplePlot: A group of rather slap dash builders are rather imaginative at solving what problems come their way. Whatever it is that doesn't fit the picture, it will be made fit in no time. This ...

biography.placeOfBirth: Wanne-Eickel, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany [now Herne, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany]
biography.bio: Willi Thomczyk was born on October 14, 1953 in Wanne-Eickel, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. He is an actor and writer, known for Die Camper (1997), Paradis express (1997) and If It Don't Fit, Use a Bigger Hammer (2002).
biography.name: Willi Thomczyk

biography.bio: Ralf Richter was born on August 17, 1957 in Essen, Germany. He is an actor and producer, known for Das Boot (1981), Bang Boom Bang - Ein todsicheres Ding (1999) and Le foot, c'est la vie (2000).
biography.name: Ralf Richter

biography.bio: Hilmi Sözer was born on March 9, 1970 in Çubuk, Ankara, Turkey. He is an actor, known for Qui peut sauver le Far West? (2001), Jerichow (2008) and Ballermann 6 (1997).
biography.name: Hilmi Sözer

biography.bio: Peter Thorwarth was born on June 3, 1971 in Dortmund, Germany. He is a director and actor, known for The Wave (2008), Bang Boom Bang - Ein todsicheres Ding (1999) and Not My Day (2014).
biography.name: Peter Thorwarth

biography.bio: Dietmar Bär was born on February 5, 1961 in Dortmund, Germany. He is an actor, known for Tatort (1970), Guys and Balls (2004) and Kehrtwende (2011). He has been married to Maren Geißler since April 15, 2009.
biography.name: Dietmar Bär

biography.bio: Born on 12 November 1978 in Bucharest, Romania, Alexandra Maria Lara fled to Germany with her parents when she was four and half years old. After graduating at the French High School, she studied acting at the Theaterwerkstatt Charlottenburg from 1997 and 2000, but had already played leading characters in several TV shows and movies such as Die Bubi Scholz Story (1998). Due to her critically acclaimed performance in Le tunnel (2001), she has appeared in several successful national and international projects, most notably the Oscar nominated Downfall (2004).
biography.name: Alexandra Maria Lara

biography.bio: Armin Dillenberger was born in 1957 in Braubach, Rhineland-Palatinate, Germany. He is an actor, known for Good Bye Lenin! (2003), 23 (1998) and If It Don't Fit, Use a Bigger Hammer (2002).
biography.name: Armin Dillenberger

biography.bio: Crescentia Dünßer was born on August 22, 1960 in Oberstdorf, Bavaria, Germany. She is an actress and director, known for L'enfant de la guerre (2006), Waller's Last Trip (1989) and If It Don't Fit, Use a Bigger Hammer (2002).
biography.name: Crescentia Dünßer

biography.placeOfBirth: Wanne-Eickel, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany [now Herne, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany]
biography.bio: Nicholas Bodeux was born on November 16, 1967 in Wanne-Eickel, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. He is an actor and director, known for Die Camper (1997), Paradis express (1997) and If It Don't Fit, Use a Bigger Hammer (2002).
biography.name: Nicholas Bodeux

biography.bio: Michael Brandner was born on January 22, 1951 in Augsburg, Bavaria, Germany. He is an actor, known for Hubert und Staller (2011), Downfall (2004) and The Monuments Men (2014). He has been married to Karin since 1997. They have one child.
biography.name: Michael Brandner

biography.bio: Patrizia Moresco was born on August 10, 1957 in Germany. She is an actress, known for Aimee & Jaguar (1999), Angie (2006) and Der Boxer und die Friseuse (2004).
biography.name: Patrizia Moresco

biography.bio: Tana Schanzara was born on December 19, 1925 in Kiel, Schleswig-Holstein, Germany as Konstanze Schwanzara. She was an actress, known for Le foot, c'est la vie (2000), Lena Rais (1979) and Jede Menge Kohle (1981). She died on December 19, 2008 in Bochum, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany.
biography.name: Tana Schanzara

biography.bio: Riccarda Menne is an actress, known for If It Don't Fit, Use a Bigger Hammer (2002).
biography.name: Riccarda Menne

biography.bio: Tilla Borgelt is an actress, known for If It Don't Fit, Use a Bigger Hammer (2002), Im Fegefeuer der Lust (1998) and Le dernier témoin (1998).
biography.name: Tilla Borgelt

biography.bio: Birgit Stojanov was born in 1967 in Germany. She is an actress, known for If It Don't Fit, Use a Bigger Hammer (2002), Meine große Liebe (2005) and Große Freiheit (1996).
biography.name: Birgit Stojanov
